name: AFOracle
description: AFOracle is an FTSO provider from AFLabs, a team that helped build the Flare's smart contract infrastructure.
general: We are a team of dApp/tooling developers. We are based in Slovenia.
infrastructure: We run all of our infrastructure. Flare and songbird nodes (also coston2 node for testing). Backup nodes and separate server for exchange data aggregation. Cca 2000 ero/month
safeguards: Yes we have a few safeguards. Some are better than others but it is getting better.
availability: We started submitting on epoch 2 on SGB. We are among the oldest FTSO’s
selling: We have to sell some to cover the taxes and infra costs (cca 30%)  We try to sell when volume spikes and not to crash the market. Cca 30% are left for long term holding/compounding. Rest is sold when we see fit.
tooling: Connect libs, periphery. Some python tooling specific to flare…
